Indicate by check mark whether the registrant 
is an emerging growth company as defined in   
Rule 405 under the Securities Act (17 CFR     
230.405) or Rule 12b-2 under the Exchange Act 
(17 CFR 240.12b-2). Emerging growth company ☐ 
If an emerging growth company, indicate by

Section 13(a) of the Exchange Act. ☐          
                                              
             Amendments to Articles of        
  Item 5.03  Incorporation or Bylaws; Change  
             in Fiscal Year.                  
                                              
On May 21, 2021, the Company filed a          
Certificate of Elimination to its Restated    
Certificate of Incorporation with the         
Secretary of State of the State of Delaware   
eliminating from the Restated Certificate of  
Incorporation all matters set forth in the    
Certificate of Designations with respect to   
its 6.30% Non-CumulativePreferred Stock,      
Series N (the “Series N Preferred Stock”). All
outstanding shares of the Series N Preferred  
Stock were redeemed on May 19, 2021. A copy of
the Certificate of Elimination relating to the
Series N Preferred Stock is listed as Exhibit 
3.1 to this Current Report on Form 8-Kand is  
incorporated herein by reference. A Restated  
Certificate of Incorporation reflecting (i)   
the filing of the Company’s Certificate of    
Designations to the Restated Certificate of   
Incorporation with the Secretary of State of  
the State of Delaware setting forth the terms 
of its 3.80% Fixed-Rate Reset Non-            
CumulativePreferred Stock, Series T, and (ii) 
the elimination of its Series N Preferred     
Stock was filed with the Secretary of State of
the State of Delaware on May 21, 2021, and is 
listed as Exhibit 3.2 to this Current Report  
on Form 8-Kand is incorporated herein by      
reference.                                    
                                              
  Item 9.01  Financial Statements and         
             Exhibits.                        
                                              
(d) Exhibits The following exhibits are filed 
as part of this Current Report on Form 8-K:   
                                              
         Certificate of Elimination relating  
         to the Series N Preferred Stock.     
         Restated Certificate of              
         Incorporation of The Goldman Sachs   
  3.1    Group, Inc., amended as of May 21,   
  3.2    2021.
